casebody.data:
DESMOND
v.
The NEWS & OBSERVER PUBLISHING COMPANY, et al. 132PA18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 1, 2019 John A. Bussian, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Bradley R. Kutrow, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Julia C. Ambrose, Attorney at Law, Mark J. Prak, Attorney at Law, Timothy Nelson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The News And Observer Publishing Company, et al. James T. Johnson, Attorney at Law, Chynna T. Smith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Desmond, Beth. William M. Wilson, III, Attorney at Law, for Professor William Van Alstyne Jonathan E. Buchan, Attorney at Law, for The Reporters Committee for Freedom of Press, et al. Wade M. Smith, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Locke, Mandy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of April 2019 by Reporters Committee for Freedom of the Press for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of May 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
